channel.title: Server spawn
channel.description: I have been looking for snippet or a tut of any kind and cant seem to find any. Im trying to make my npc (Avatar of dest) spawn every 30 minutes and announce it on the server. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Server spawn
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Make an event that begins every 30 minutes (remember its by milliseconds so figure out how many milliseconds are in 30 minutes) and then in the event method: if the NPC is dead, spawn another one and make a global message that says that it has respawned, else do nothing.

Read full topic
